English: En route to the front
Comment:
On load mission
STRM_ONLOAD_INTRO,Several days later
column7:
On load intro

STRM_12v01,I have to commend you for your performance
column8: Rashiv. I am almost starting to consider assigning you to the Spetsnaz!"

English: Thank you sir! But I am not of that stock. The battlefield is where I feel at home.
I know Rashiv. This might surprise you, but I did know your father. You're very much alike.
He was a good soldier. And a loyal friend... You remind me greatly of him.
Sir, thank you. I actually didn't know that. I always looked up to my father. He was the only family I ever had...\nMajor Lemontov, did you... were you there when my father died?
Was I...? Hm... He was a brave man, loyal, determined, believing in what was right... And that's exactly how he died.
I think this discussion is best for another time. You are needed at the front, Rashiv. Good luck and dismissed!
Understood, sir!
What can we expect from the enemy, sir?
Light tanks or APCs and a shit ton of infantry.
Can't believe we're losing this quickly! We lost half the island in four days!\nEven Everon blends in comparison to this shitshow.
They landed in the south, where the terrain is open. Ideal for their armour and numerical superiority.
Exactly, Rashiv! So do not worry men, we shall stop them here in the mountains and forests!\nCheck your weapons, we're close!
WE'VE ARRIVED JUST IN TIME. THOSE GUYS ARE BARELY HOLDING!
GOOD THAT YOU'RE HERE, ROMAN. WE'RE EXPECTING ANOTHER ASSAULT ANY MOMENT!
ROMAN TO BAZA, ENEMY ASSAULT REPELLED. WE'RE AWAITING FURTHER ORDERS, OVER.
BAZA TO ROMAN, UNDERSTOOD. GOOD WORK. WAIT FOR CONVOY WITH SQUAD BORIS AND COUNTER-ATTACK THE ENEMY BASE. BAZA OUT.
ROMAN TO BAZA. COUNTERATTACK SUCCESSFUL. THE BASE IS OURS. ROMAN OUT.
HOLD YOUR POSITIONS! THIS WAS NOT ALL THEY GOT! I HEAR A TANK IN THE DISTANCE...
Support the Base
SUPPORT THE BASE
